name: Sex Story - Ruby and Hunter - Episode 2
name_original: Sex Story - Ruby and Hunter - Episode 2
description:
A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Ruby joining Hunter at his new house for a night full of passion. Once there, he denies her advances until she agrees to be his sexual partner for an extended time. Will Ruby accept his indecent proposal?

Game description

Follow Ruby & Hunter’s wild SEX STORY in a new and captivating format.

EPISODE 2 brings you a horny Hunter who couldn’t stop thinking about Ruby.
The fiery redhead really did a number on him.
Those luscious curves and the sexy sounds she made as he pounded into her sweet warmth haunted him still. So despite Ruby's adamant rule of staying away, he returned to the Bar to see her.
Surprisingly, she took a night off from bar-tending, and Hunter found her enjoying herself on the dance floor. The tipsy redhead was playing hard to get. But little by little, Hunter melted away her resistance with his irresistible charm, and here she was an hour later, stepping inside Hunter’s new house and ready to rip his clothes off.
Only our boy has bigger plans for Ruby. He will not settle for just another one-night stand with the redhead. He plans to deny her sexual advances until she agrees to be his naughty little partner for an extended time and further explore this insatiable sexual hunger they have in common.

Will Ruby agree to Hunter’s indecent proposal?
Follow their Sex Story and find out.

Features

- 60+ HD renders
